CustomField.formula: IMAGE( IF( High_Priority__c = True, "/img/samples/flag_red.gif", IF(RecordType.DeveloperName == "Operation_Exception" && Current_Status_Age__c < 1, "/img/samples/flag_green.gif", IF(RecordType.DeveloperName == "Operation_Exception" && Current_Status_Age__c >= 1 && Current_Status_Age__c < 2, "/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0156S00000JKtww", IF(RecordType.DeveloperName == "Operation_Exception" && Current_Status_Age__c >= 2, "/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0156S00000JKtwx", IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Account.Ind_10K__c , "10K"), ISPICKVAL( Account.Ind_10K__c , "Potential 10K")), "/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "/s.gif"))))), "Priority Flag")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: "High priority" indicator used for MyPR and Waiting List Red: Check box High Priority Yellow: Client 10K or Potential 10K
CustomField.label: Priority Flag
